title: Episode 73: Mama O’s Kimchee
description: Cathy Erway sits down with Kheedim Oh, founder of Mama O’s Kimchee on this week’s episode of Let’s Eat In. Find out why kimchee is so hot right now (both in spice and popularity), and learn why frozen kimchee might be the next trend! Kheedim dishes on his favorite kimchee recipes, his ideal date meals, and his side career as a music producer. This episode was sponsored by Just Food & The City Chicken Project.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
